ing: 1/2 fluid ounce orange-flavored liqueur (such as CointreauÂ®), or to taste
1 teaspoon orange juice, or to taste
des: "This is a refreshing version of a cosmopolitan martini using blood oranges."
ins: Place ice cubes in a cocktail shaker; top with blood orange juice, vodka, and orange-flavored liqueur. Cover shaker and shake; strain drink into a martini glass. Top drink with orange juice and garnish with lime wedge.
